name: Epoxy resin coatings otherwise complying with 21 CFR 175.300(b)(3)(viii) that also contain polyoxypropylenediamine
FoodContactSubstance: Epoxy resin coatings otherwise complying with 21 CFR 175.300(b)(3)(viii) that also contain polyoxypropylenediamine (CAS Reg. No. 9046-10-0) as a cross linking component.
